column1: CDER Library Form - SF-424 Mandatory Form

column2: The SF-424(M) is the government-wide data set for grant applications/plans and related submissions under mandatory grant programs. Federal agencies and grant applicants will use the standard data set and definitions for paper and electronic grants applications/plans and related submissions under mandatory grant programs. The proposed standard data set replaces numerous agency data sets and reduces the administrative burden placed on the grants community, Federal agencies will not be required to collect all of the information included in the proposed data set.

column1: Total of 69 Data Elements Found(Note: The data elements in this file follow the form sequence and may contain duplicates):
Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance (CFDA) Number
Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance (CFDA) Title
List of Program/Project Congressional Districts Attachment
Agency Instructions Specified Supporting Documents Attachment
